metadata.title: UnderGents 3 Pack Men's Boxer Brief Underwear. More Comfort Without Compression
features: What Goes Underneath Is Important: Join millions of other comfortable men in UnderGents men's underwear. Feel the unbelievable ultra soft comfort without compression. There is NO cycle short or tight compression feel in UnderGents; just CloudSoft comfort underneath all the time. You will find UnderGents are the most comfortable underwear you have ever worn, and you will be inspired every day. Finally, comfort underneath is possible for every man.

Cooling Breathable Moisture Wicking Microclimate: Our nature based CloudSoft micro modal fabric is multiple times softer & cooler than Cotton or Polyester. Unlike underwear made from polyester, UnderGents’ CloudSoft has incredible air permeability to keep you cool, dry and fresh all day & night. No more swampy smelly hot box underwear. Remember, those Polyester undies are a form of plastic, just like a garbage bag, so don’t wear garbage underwear, be comfortable in UnderGents!
Comfort Sized For Men (Based on Waist Size): XS 27-29; Small 30-32, Med. 33-35; Large 36-38, XL 39-42, 2XL 43-46, 3XL 47-50: No Fly (We are Over The Top Comfort)

Multi Panel Vitruvian Design: This inspired multi-panel design insures a comfortable modern fit that moves with you, the way a man moves, without bunching and pulling; a seamless seat for rear-end comfort in any position, contoured front pouch with enhanced package support keeps everything comfortably in place looking great & no compression; inside-flat stitching insures comfort with NO chafing, itching, or scratching; custom soft no-tag no-roll moisture wicking waistband for added comfort.

Feel the CloudSoft Difference - Unlike most underwear made from Nylon, Polyester (petroleum based synthetic fibers) or Cotton; UnderGents CloudSoft underwear don’t trap heat, perspiration, & stink, so you’ll never feel sweaty, sticky, and stinky (swampy). Breathable Cooling Moisture Wicking Microclimate - Enjoy a floating-clouds air-silk feel that is multiple times softer, cooler, & more absorbent than cotton or polyester. UnderGents keep you comfortable, dry, odor-free, & fresh all day & night
description: 3 Pack of Undergents Men’s Boxer Brief Underwear. More Ultra Soft Cooling Comfort in Every Package. You Will Love the Limitless Comfort Without Compression. Men's Underwear Should Be Comfortable & In UnderGents Men Find Incredible Comfort And Style. What Goes Underneath Is Important! No Polyester Trapping Heat and Stink With UnderGents. UnderGents Are Made With Our Incredible Cloudsoft Material That Uses A Natural, Plant Based Micro Modal For The Most Comfortable & Best Fitting Underwear For Men Of All Shapes And Sizes. Exceptionally Soft And Ultra Cool Against Your Skin, The Moisture Wicking Microclimate Technology Keeps You Dry And Fresh. The Stylish Multi Panel Modern Fit Moves The Way You Move For Unsurpassed Comfort And Eliminates Binding And Pulling. Our Custom Tagless Comfort Waistband Delivers No-Scratch Happiness. Our Promise: The Most Comfortable Men’s Underwear For All-Day, Everyday, Everyway Comfort!

title: Want to know why UnderGents are more comfortable?
UnderGents Boxer Briefs - Comfort Feels Awesome
Feel great all day in UnderGents. Comfort Not Compression
